verses.roman:
rājā kahe,-aiche kāśī-miśrera bhavana
ṭhākurera nikaṭa, haya parama nirjana

synonyms: rājā kahe—the King replied; aiche—exactly like that; kāśī-miśrera bhavana—the house of Kāśī Miśra; ṭhākurera nikaṭa—near Lord Jagannātha; haya—is; parama—very much; nirjana—secluded.
translation: The King replied, "Kāśī Miśra's house is exactly what you require. It is near the temple and is very much secluded, calm and quiet."
